title: I Think We're Alone Now
description: Put away that Aqua Net and slip into something a little more comfortable with one of twelve couples as they fall in love in Pine Grove.Travis:After six years in the Army, being a security guard for Pine Grove Galleria is underwhelming to say the least. But, it’s something while I wait on my acceptance to the police academy. Until I’m voluntold to play bodyguard for the pop princess Glitter...and I discover that under all that make-up isn’t just another spoiled radio star, but my best friend’s sister. And she’s all grown up....dialing all my senses up to eleven...Elle:That mob of fans screaming my name? No problem! My superstar alter ego performs to massive crowds no matter where we go – but when my security detail bails on me right before a show at my hometown mall, I’m left high and dry. Finding out that my brother’s best friend is his replacement? That catches me off guard, especially when sparks start to fly faster than a skee ball down the lane. Just how close is too close to your longtime secret crush turned bodyguard?Welcome to Pine Grove, home of the Pine Grove Galleria! The 80's are roaring in.
author: Claire  Hastings
